adjective.description: Derogatory (chiefly United States regional (southern)). Designating a person regarded as low, cowardly, or contemptible, especially (in the southern United States) a northerner (sometimes specifically a New Englander).
Especially in the names of animals: having a distinctive blue belly.

origin: Mid 17th century; earliest use found in Faithfull Scout. From blue + bellied.
